name: Slime Adventure (itch) (fiwkung)
description:
INTRO

SLIME ADVENTURE GAME IS SOLVE PUZZLES GAME WHERE PLAYER MUST FIND A WAY OUT .  WHICH HAS TRAPS WAITING TO CREATE A STIR FOR THE PLAYER.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS
  • W  - FORWARD
  •  D  - TURN RIGHT
  •   A  - TURN LEFT
  •   S   -  BACK
HOW  TO  PLAY

PLAYER MUST BE CAREFUL OF TRAPS . TAKE THE BALL TO PRESS THE BUTTON OPEN GATE

THIS IS PART OF A PROJECT COMMISSIONED BY THE UNIVERSITY 

THANK YOU FOR TAKING THE TIME TO PLAY. ❤

DOWNLOAD & INSTALL

Download File  : Slime Adventure V1.7.rar >> Extract File .rar And Enjoin
